description: Enhance error diagnostics and logging. Currently errors show as 'error: null' or generic messages. Capture stderr, stdout, exit codes with context and provide actionable suggestions for common errors.

userStories.title: Capture full stderr and stdout on errors
userStories.description: As a developer, I want full error output captured so that I can debug failures effectively
acceptanceCriteria: Capture complete stderr output on command failures
Include exit code with meaning (e.g., 127 = command not found)
Test by triggering intentional error and verifying log

userStories.title: Add actionable suggestions for common errors
userStories.description: As a developer, I want helpful suggestions when common errors occur so that I can fix issues quickly
acceptanceCriteria: Detect common error patterns (file not found, permission denied, command not found, etc.)
Provide specific fix suggestions for each pattern
Include relevant file paths and line numbers when available
Format suggestions as clear action items
userStories.notes: Extend error classification in lib/execution-logger.sh lines 91-150

userStories.title: Improve error messages in main loop
userStories.description: As a user, I want clear error messages from claude-loop so that I understand what went wrong
acceptanceCriteria: Replace generic error messages with specific details
Include context about what operation was being performed
Show relevant configuration that might have caused the error
Test by reviewing error output from main loop
userStories.notes: Modify error handling in claude-loop.sh lines 4410-4540
